activities:
Personal Information Received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland:
Acclarent, Inc. receives personal information in various forms relating to personnel, including prospective and former employees. These data are transferred from the EU/EEA to the United States and are used to carry out the company’s human resources functions. In addition, Acclarent receives personal information about its customers in support of Compliant Handling/Adverse Event functions.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Human Resources and Complaint Handling/Adverse Events.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) (for human resources data); JAMs (for all other data)
